mapper.select: SELECT s.space_id, space_name, space_icon_path FROM spaces s INNER JOIN space_users su ON s.space_id = su.space_id WHERE su.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY space_signup_date DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO spaces (space_name, space_description, space_pw, space_code, space_user_tally, space_icon_name, space_icon_path, space_icon_uuid, space_icon_size) VALUES(#{spaceName}, #{spaceDescription}, #{spacePw}, #{spaceCode}, #{spaceUserTally}, #{spaceIconName}, #{spaceIconPath}, #{spaceIconUuid}, #{spaceIconSize})
SELECT MAX(space_id) FROM spaces
mapper.update: UPDATE spaces SET space_name=#{spaceName}, space_description=#{spaceDescription}, space_pw=#{spacePw}, space_icon_name=#{spaceIconName}, space_icon_path=#{spaceIconPath}, space_icon_uuid=#{spaceIconUuid}, space_icon_size=#{spaceIconSize}, space_update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE space_id=#{spaceId}
mapper.select: SELECT space_user_tally FROM spaces WHERE space_id=#{spaceId}
mapper.delete: DELETE s FROM spaces s INNER JOIN space_users su ON s.space_id = su.space_id WHERE s.space_user_tally = 1 AND su.user_id = #{userId} AND su.user_admin_yn = TRUE;
